attributes.action: Strip First Capital Connect of Thameslink Franchise Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
I call on this department to immediately cancel First Capital Connect's franchise for the Thameslink route and take it over like they with the East Coast Mainline.

First Capital Connect must be Britain's worst train company. I travel to work on their trains off peak yet they are always overcrowded. I get on at East Croydon and very rarely get a seat until London Bridge!!! They run short 4 carriage trains when they really need 8 or even 12 carriage trains.

The trains themselves are dirty, old and decrepit, the seats are falling apart, the toilets are disgusting and there is no adequate storage space for bicycles they have to be lent up against seats which is just not acceptable in 2012!
